messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Welcome to AlwaysLearning
messages.msgSnippet: I m thinking back to when I was 14. It would have been the ultimate thrill for me to be involved in a list like this, actually, it s pretty special for me even
messages.messageBody:
I'm thinking back to when I was 14. It would have been the ultimate thrill for me to be involved in a list like this, actually, it's pretty special for me even today!

Glad you're here and hope you have some fun Roxana! :o) It would be great hearing a teens opinion on various topics, if you're ever so inclined to join in.

Karin



LutraPearl@... wrote:

> Hello, all. My name is Roxana, and I'm Pam's fourteen year old daughter. :)
>
> I just joined this list because I was reading it over my mother's shoulder,
> and it seemed very interesting.
>
> So - there's my reason, here I am, and hello again. :)
>
> --Roxana

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Welcome to AlwaysLearning
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Roxana Good to see you here - and merry Christmas from New Zealand, where it is Boxing Day and the skies are blue, the sun is shining, and It is sooo hot
messages.messageBody:
Hi Roxana

Good to see you here - and merry Christmas from New Zealand, where it is
Boxing Day and the skies are blue, the sun is shining, and It is sooo
hot already at 8.40 in the morning that I think it might be a good day
to head down to the beach for a swim :-)

Carol
